SingleRuleProvider, TattletaleRuleProvider, UIRuleProvider, UnzipArchivesToOutputRuleProvider, ValidateXmlFilesRuleProvider
    public abstract class AbstractRuleProvider
extends org.ocpsoft.rewrite.context.ContextBase
implements RuleProvider
    AbstractRuleProvider provides metadata, and a list of Rule objects that are then evaluated by the RuleSubset during Windup execution.
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III, Ondrej Zizka, I
